snippet.title: SAMURAI WARRIORS 2: XTREME LEGENDS (PS2) TRAILER
snippet.description:
Power up your Samurai Warriors 2 experience with a multitude of new characters, play modes, levels and explosive extras or simply experience the Samurai Warriors experience for the first time and be completely blown away.

Official Site: http://samuraiwarriors2xl.co.uk
Platform(s): PlayStation 2 / Xbox 360

Best Regards,
KOEI Ltd. - http://koei.co.uk
